cgcloud__Account_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Template__c
cgcloud__Account_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the account template object that's to be used for accounts.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the Customer Template record is active (true) or not (false).

cgcloud__Available_Product_Level__c.description: Specifies the multiple sets of values that the user can choose, which are further used to aggregate the calculation grid for the account plan.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Initial_Roles__c.description: Set of roles that a new account receives when it's created on the CGCloud Mobility App.

cgcloud__KPI_Set_Plan_Dependent__c.description: Reference to the KPI Set, which has Plan usage and is child object dependent.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the customer template belongs.
